oai_dc:dc.dc:title: K (0) of hypersurfaces defined by x (1) (2) + ... + x (n) (2) = +/- 1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KESHARI, MK
MANDAL, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: K-0(A)
Clifford algebra
Euler class group
EULER CLASSES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let k be a field of characteristic not equal 2 and let Q (n,m) (x (1), ..., x (n) , y (1), ..., y (m) ) = x (1) (2) +...+x (n) (2) - (y (1) (2) +...+y (m) (2) ) be a quadratic form over k. Let R(Q (n,m) ) = R (n,m) = k[x (1), ..., x (n) , y (1), ..., y (m) ]/(Q (n,m) - 1). In this note we will calculate for every n,m a parts per thousand yen 0. We will also calculate CH (0)(R (n,m) ) and the Euler class group of R (n,m) when k = a"e.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF PURE & APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 44(2)119-129
